document_data.name: Ylyndar Starscatter
document_data.mainbody: '''Ylyndar Starscatter''' was an inhabitant of [[Cormanthyr]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Per [[Ivran Selorn]], Ylyndar had snuck into [[Castle Dlardrageth]] for trysts across six summers up to {{yearlink|241}}. This led Ivran to judge that the castle must not have been haunted.
